text: The flag of Morelia () has two horizontal stripes of yellow and red with the coat of arms of Morelia conceived by the emperor Carlos V in 1539 when it was named Valladolid. It was adopted 4 May 2021. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code Yellow #F1BF00 Red #AD1519 === Historical flags === File:Bandera de la provincia de Michoacán.svg| Flag of the Province of Michoacán (1537–1625) File:Flag yellow red 5x3.svg| Flag of Valladolid (1625-1991) ==References== Morelia Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Morelia
